metadata.title: Underlying trend, seasonality, prediction, forecasting and the contribution of risk factors: an analysis of globally reported cases of Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus – CORRIGENDUM

body_text.text: The above published article was submitted to Epidemiology and Infection with an incorrect corresponding author email.
